text: Aino Lohikoski (1898–1981) was a Finnish actress.Qvist & von Bagh p.287 ==Selected filmography== * Substitute Wife (1936) * Tree Without Fruit (1947) * Mother or Woman (1953) == References == == Bibliography == * Qvist, Per Olov & von Bagh, Peter. title: Aino Lohikoski
